text:
May I just say that after spending the week knee deep in extending the wordpress api, I am truly grateful for good documentation in HubSpot.
Thanks to the whole team on both the api and cms side of things. You guys rock

Thank you for the kind words. We do our best, we still feel we have a lot of improvements to make but hearing feedback like this tells us we're on the right track.

Keep giving us your feedback, we are listening and want to keep iterating and making them better for you.
that’s another reason why its amazing with y’all – you’re always listening!
